name: Evo (5Z3L4, OsheOse, adikuu122, matitek)
description:
Friendly slime Evo has landed on the evil planet, which is evolving every 50 seconds. Are you good enough to save Evo's life, and beat other players highscores? 

Press space while Evo is on ground to jump, and press space midair to immedietly fall down! You're rewarded for everytime when Evo is leaving ground! Don't forget to collect green things! 

Game made for ScoreSpace Jam #24
